page.title: 13EVENTS IN CLAYBROOKE
page.content: THE FUN RUN by David Buckle The Fun Run was held for the first time in Claybrooke . It is hoped to be an annual event. It was 6Kms long. We all lined up ready to start and set off at 12.00 from the school. 93 competitors took part.We left Claybooke Parva, went past Ullesthorpe Court, the Scout Hut,and in to Claybrooke Magna. I finished half-an-hour later on the school field. We all received a plaque and a certificate to show we had finished the race. BRAINSTRAIN QUIZ COMPETITION (first ever) was organised by Lutterworth Independent Newspaper. A team of 3 residents from Claybrooke Magna reached the grand final and won the Challenge Trophy.
